knimeNode.name: DL Keras Network Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads a Keras network from an input file.

fullDescription.intro: This node reads a Keras deep learning network from an input file. The file can either contain a full, pre-trained network (.h5 file) or just a network specification without weights (.json or .yaml file).
fullDescription.option: The path to the input file that contains the Keras network.

option.name: Copy deep learning network into KNIME workflow?

fullDescription.option: If selected, the Keras network will be copied into the KNIME workflow, i.e. it will be available when exporting the KNIME workflow with data. Otherwise, only a reference to the actual network file is used by KNIME.
